query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZBST407 ( MANDT, BS407_DEP, BS407_RDT, BS407_SEQ, BS407_SIR, BS407_JRT, BS407_NCD, BS407_JDT, BS407_JID, BS407_ADT, BS407_AID ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #BS201_DEP#, #BS201_RDT#, #BS201_SEQ#, #BS201_SIR#, #BS201_JRT#, #BS201_NCD#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), #G_USER_ID# )
